parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause the vehicle to lose traction and stability, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the vehicle pulls to one side while braking
the vehicle spins or loses control while braking
and multiple warning lights on the dashboard illuminate.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ESC system can cause the vehicle to lose traction and stability, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: the vehicle pulls to one side while braking
the vehicle spins or loses control while braking

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the vehicle to lose the ability to stop, leading to accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the vehicle pulls to one side while braking
the vehicle spins or loses control while braking
and the brake warning light illuminates.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS module can cause the loss of steering control, disable power steering, and affect electronic stability control, leading to accidents or near-accidents.
symptoms: The ABS light and other lights on the dashboard illuminate
the speedometer and fuel gauge malfunction
and the vehicle may experience oversteer or understeer.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Ignition Key Stuck and Unable to Turn Off
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The issue can cause the vehicle to remain running, posing a safety risk, and may also lead to battery drain or other electrical system failures.
symptoms: unable to turn off the vehicle
key does not return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS system can lead to loss of vehicle control, increased stopping distances, and accidents.
The failure of the electrical system can lead to loss of critical vehicle functions, increased risk of accidents, and safety hazards.
The issues can cause loss of vehicle control, increased stopping distances, and accidents.

The failure of the ABS control module can cause the loss of anti-lock braking, traction control, and electronic stability control, leading to increased stopping distances, loss of vehicle control, and potentially accidents.
symptoms: and brake warning lights illuminate on the dashboard
the vehicle's brakes may lock up or fail to engage
the vehicle may experience unexpected oversteer or understeer
and transmission shifting may be affected.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ABS hydraulic pump can cause the loss of anti-lock braking, leading to increased stopping distances and potentially accidents.
symptoms: The ABS warning light illuminates on the dashboard
the vehicle's brakes may lock up or fail to engage
and the vehicle may experience unexpected oversteer or understeer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The recall remedies for the ABS control module failure may not fully address the underlying issues, leaving some vehicles with faulty modules unrepaired and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The recall remedies may not cover the replacement of the ABS hydraulic pump
and the software update may not be performed if the module has already failed.
